screen.title: Example 1
screen.subtitle: Use of dropdown selection with values from a SELECT

param.name: Department
param.select: SELECT "Id", "Dept Name" FROM "HR members"."Departments" ORDER BY "Dept Name"

screen.query: SELECT "HR employees"."Id", "HR employees"."Employee Name", "HR employees"."date Hired /hq", "Assignments"."Id Employee", "Assignments"."Id Department", "Departments"."Id" AS "IDdep", "Departments"."Dept Name" FROM "HR members"."HR employees" LEFT JOIN "HR members"."Assignments" ON "HR employees"."Id" = "Assignments"."Id Employee" LEFT JOIN "HR members"."Departments" ON "Assignments"."Id Department" = "Departments"."Id"

screen.title: Example 2
screen.subtitle: Use of dropdown selection, see alias

param.name: Department
param.select: SELECT "Id", "Dept Name" FROM "HR members"."Departments" ORDER BY "Dept Name"

screen.query: SELECT "eM"."Id", "eM"."Employee Name", "eM"."date Hired /hq", "aS"."Id Employee", "aS"."Id Department", "dE"."Id" AS "IDdep", "dE"."Dept Name" FROM "HR members"."HR employees" AS "eM" LEFT JOIN "HR members"."Assignments" AS "aS" ON "eM"."Id" = "aS"."Id Employee" LEFT JOIN "HR members"."Departments" AS "dE" ON "aS"."Id Department" = "dE"."Id"

screen.selectDescription: Use of BLOBS (note: using content of the 2nd SIARD package)
screen.title: Integration of RTF, JPG, PDF
screen.subtitle: Some examples. Note: LOB value is not displayed, it is just detected and then a link is displayed with record id
screen.query:
SELECT "dbo"."table10"."id", "dbo"."table10"."poradi",
CASE WHEN "obsah" IS NULL THEN null ELSE "dbo"."table10"."poradi" END AS "RTF",
CASE WHEN "picture" IS NULL THEN null ELSE "dbo"."table10"."poradi" END AS "JPG",
CASE WHEN "documentpdf" IS NULL THEN null ELSE "dbo"."table10"."poradi" END AS "PDF",
"dbo"."table10"."name" FROM "dbo"."table10"

blob.query: SELECT 'application/rtf' AS "ContentType", 'obsah.rtf' AS "filename", "obsah" AS "blob" FROM "dbo"."table10" WHERE "poradi" = ?
SELECT 'image/jpeg' AS "ContentType", 'picture.jpg' AS "filename", "picture" AS "blob" FROM "dbo"."table10" WHERE "poradi" = ?
SELECT 'application/pdf' AS "ContentType", 'document.pdf' AS "filename", "documentpdf" AS "blob" FROM "dbo"."table10" WHERE "poradi" = ?
